newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Metro details capitalisation award terms.
newsitem.headline: Metro details capitalisation award terms.

text.p: Metro Cash and Carry Ltd said on Monday that shareholders had to be registered in the firm's books on June 13 to qualify for a capitalisation share award.

Shareholders will be entitled to new shares in the ratio that 4.0 cents multiplied by 1.05 bears to the issue price, which is defined as the weighted average traded price of the firm's ordinary shares on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange for the three days ending June 12.
Shareholders can instead elect to receive the 4.0 cents cash dividend.
